Icon stacking

You can overlay more icon at specific positions and a specific color <i>file<sub>+</sub></i> = file+

  • filter+ Mail edit
  • mail-outlinepencil File edit
  • mail-outline8 8 Unread
  • imagechain Image URL
  • mailmail-attachment Mail attachment
  • bluetoothtool-magnifier Bluetooth Search
  • file+ File Add
  • folder+ Folder add
  • folderimage Folder Image
  • folderdevice-gamepad Folder Game
  • folderarrow-down Folder Download
  • callarrow-forward Call forward
  • callchevron-left Call incoming
  • callchevron-right Call outgoing
  • calltrack-pause Call hold
  • call$ Call price
  • file? File Unknow
  • bellnot silence
